title: Deals: Google Pixel 5 sees 1-day discount at $249 off, Samsung 512GB microSD card $60, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are now headlined by a 1-day Google Pixel 5 discount at $249 off. That’s alongside Samsung’s EVO Select 512GB microSD card at $60 and JBL’s Xtreme 3 Waterproof Speaker at $260. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Google Pixel 5 sees 1-day discount at $249 off, Samsung 512GB microSD card $60, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Pixel 5 discount has arrived for 1-day only at $249 off to go alongside Samsung's latest 512GB microSD card at $60 and more.
